song.englishname: The Definition Of Me (featuring Blanca from Group 1 Crew)

english.segment1: Everybody's got an opinion. Of what they want me to be. Everybody's got a condition. That I may never meet
english.segment2: So tired of looking in the mirror. It always says the same thing. I want to be about something different. Something more than the mirror can see
english.segment3: Like joy, peace. Alive in me. When it comes to my identity
english.segment4: I want the love. I want the light. I want the beauty. On the inside. I want the one that you can't see. To be the definition of me. More than the face. More than the girl. More than the voice. More than the world. I want the truth that I believe. To be the definition of me
english.segment5: Pretty is cool for a minute. But it always fades away. Trends are hot for a second. They'll be gone the very next day
english.segment6: So before you get lost in the moment. Lets get one thing clear. Only love will last forever. That's the reason that we're here
english.segment7: It's up to you cause everybody's looking. Who do you want them to see?
english.segment9: They say Im cute with the boots. And the trendy attire. You kinda reminiscent of a younger Mariah. But do they see beyond what I got, what I rock. Theyd be shocked if they knew it was my soul that was hot. Hot boys dont affect my own self respect (no!). And neither do the magazines and vanity tests. Yo Disa make a list. Whos fly and whats next. Start it off with love, joy, peace, and end it with blessed. Muah!
english.segment11: . (Featuring Blanca from Group 1 Crew) / (1 Peter 3:3-4, Philippians 3:7-11)
